hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x pip3 install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple python-magic beautifulsoup4
#export PYTHONPATH=/home/jenkins/ci_check
#python3 /home/jenkins/ci_check/src/tools/compare.py -t diff -w /home/jenkins/extract -d /home/jenkins/detail -f ${cmp_side_a} ${cmp_side_b} -o diff.md
#cd openeuler-jenkins #echo "python3 src/tools/compare.py -t diff -w /home/jenkins/extract -d /home/jenkins/detail -f ${cmp_side_a} ${cmp_side_b} -o /home/jenkins/diff.md" >/tmp/abc #sleep 10000
#sudo losetup -d /dev/loop0 || echo "detach loop0" #sudo losetup -d /dev/loop1 || echo "detach loop1" #echo "python3 src/tools/compare.py -t diff -w /home/jenkins/extract -d /home/jenkins/detail -r ${cmp_side_a} ${cmp_side_b} -o /home/jenkins/diff.md -a ${arch} -v" >/tmp/abc #python3 src/tools/compare.py -t diff -w /home/jenkins/extract -d /home/jenkins/detail -r ${cmp_side_a} ${cmp_side_b} -o /home/jenkins/diff.md -a ${arch} -v
python3 src/tools/compare.py -t diff -w /home/jenkins/extract -d /home/jenkins/detail -f ${cmp_side_a} ${cmp_side_b} -o /home/jenkins/diff.md -a ${arch} -v
#sudo losetup -d /dev/loop0 || echo "detach loop0" #sudo losetup -d /dev/loop1 || echo "detach loop1"
sed -i s"/\/home\/jenkins\/detail/http:\/\/${repo_server}\/compare\/detail/" /home/jenkins/diff.md
now=$(date "+%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S") diff_markdown_name="${now}_$(basename $cmp_side_a)_$(basename $cmp_side_b)_${arch}.md" diff_markdown=/repo/openeuler/compare/$diff_markdown_name diff_detail=/repo/openeuler/compare/
scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null /home/jenkins/diff.md root@${repo_server}:$diff_markdown scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null /home/jenkins/detail root@${repo_server}:$diff_detail echo "click http://${repo_server}/compare/$diff_markdown_name view detail" set -x
